SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Class representing the controller of a single game. Manages 2 to 4 players and all the actions they can perform during a game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final GameModel
    gameModel
    Reference to game model.
    private int
    maxReconnectionTime
    Max time before a reconnection, after which the game ends.
    private final PingPongManager
    pingPongManager
    PingPongManager of the game, accepts players' pings and sends pongs, in order to manage connection problems.

    Constructor of a GameController with only the first player.

      void changeCurrPlayer()

      private void endGame()
      Method that deletes the game from the lobby controller.

    • isFull

      private boolean isFull()
      Method telling if there are available places in the game.
      Returns:
      true if no other player can connect to the game

    • setup

      private void setup()
      Method to set up the game: the first player is chosen and 4 cards (2 gold and 2 resource) are revealed.

    • addPoints

      private void addPoints(String nickname, int x, int y)
      Method that adds points to a player and checks if a player had reached 20 points.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player
      x - where the card is placed in the matrix
      y - where the card is placed in the matrix
